data.eml:eml: Genetic and morphological evidence for a new cryptic species of Ectinogonia (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) from central Chile

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anguita-Salinas, Simón, Barahona-Segovia, Rodrigo M., Poulin, Elie, Zúñiga-Reinoso, Alvaro (2017): Genetic and morphological evidence for a new cryptic species of Ectinogonia (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) from central Chile. Zootaxa 4303 (2): 284-292, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4303.2.8
